Html:
Hi,

I'm glad to see some of the bugs in the warlock module have been fixed. Seems the calculated dps makes more sense as well and the gear optimizer finally gives advice I can understand and might even follow. So far for the positive things. Now for the gear upgrade option. I must say that the advice given there seems to be totally ridiculous. Crafted blues and blue quest rewards are rated higher than level 226+ epics?

For instance with neck pieces:

Choker of the Betrayer: 49,31 (level 171 blue)
Emerald Choker: 28,51 (level 200 blue)
Amulet of Truesight: 21.06 (level 34!!!! blue)
Evoker's Charm: 20,11 (level 226 epic)

Unless I've seriously screwed up settings this must surely be a mistake.

Onyx.
This should be in the Issue Tracker
